page.title: 20FARMER'S DAUGHTERS REPORT 2.
page.content: We have a lane that parts the house and gardens from the fields. The stone sheds are in very good condition. My Dad has just made a spacious new barn of sheet iron and metal posts, which is 25 metres by 15 metres in size. The lane is tarmac and the yards are concrete. There is a small sheep dip, which my Dad has just made, in the concrete by the side of the barn. Once a year we have a sheep shearer in. We have machinery, some second hand. My Dad sometimes takes sheep to auctions to sell them. Sometimes he buys a few more. Samantha.
